line: Hello… are you there? The train… I don’t know where it’s going. You said to call if I got scared.

choices.text: I’m here. Take a deep breath.

line: Thank you… I remember pieces. A hospital… someone named Anna. I… I can’t see clearly.

choices.text: It’s okay, I’ll stay with you.

line: The windows… I think we’re moving through fog. It’s empty… yet crowded in my mind.
I see her… or maybe I don’t. Was it a hospital bed? I feel… lost. Was she… gone?

choices.text: Push him to confront the truth.

line: I… I think I understand now. Thank you. It’s like… I was waiting for someone to help me see again.

choices.text: Hold on, I’m not done with you yet.
